external_games.name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji

name: Mystic Destinies: Serendipity of Aeons - Shinji
summary: "It's fine, don't worry about it." These are common words said by Shinji, who is well-known around Hagiwara's campus for being a helpful guy. But when people misread his reliable nature for something more, he withdraws into himself.
